response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe will greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its immense value to you, I propose a special offer to acquire this item at a price of $1,350,000. This price reflects the high quality and potential impact of the product, while also ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to discussing the details further and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both parties.", "product_price": 1350000}
